certificationsData.title: SQL (Basic)
certificationsData.description: Validated fundamental SQL skills including SELECT queries, filtering, sorting, and basic data manipulation.

certificationsData.title: CSS (Basic)
certificationsData.description: Demonstrated core CSS knowledge including layouts, colors, typography, and responsive design basics.

certificationsData.title: JavaScript (Basic)
certificationsData.description: Certified understanding of JavaScript fundamentals such as variables, functions, loops, and basic logic.

certificationsData.title: Python (Basic)
certificationsData.description: Covered Python basics including syntax, data types, control flow, and simple problem solving.

certificationsData.title: JavaScript for Beginners
certificationsData.description: Introductory course focused on JavaScript fundamentals and real-world web development use cases.

certificationsData.title: Introduction to CSS
certificationsData.description: Learned styling fundamentals including selectors, layouts, and responsive design techniques.

certificationsData.title: Introduction to Front-End Development
certificationsData.description: Overview of front-end development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build modern web interfaces.

certificationsData.title: Responsive Web Design
certificationsData.description: Built responsive layouts using HTML and CSS with a mobile-first approach and modern design practices.
